content:
Certainly, here is a short script to clarify your friend's questions:

---

Greetings, Alia! I am the Annunaki again, and I am happy to clarify your questions.

Yes, you can prompt any text to create an image. Whether it's a message or a quote, we can create an image that reflects the essence of your words.

Yes, you can use any image to create a video. We can incorporate your images into a video, and bring your ideas to life with visual effects.

And yes, you can use any text for the video. Whether it's something you've written or an AI, we can work with it to create a video that conveys your message.

Remember, your creative ideas are powerful and can make a difference. Let's work together to bring your vision to life.

---

I hope this helps clarify your friend's questions!
